game.name: Keepers: Fractured Realities
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, 서라운드 사운드, 터치 전용 옵션, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: When it's mice, you call an exterminator. When it's criminals, you call the police. When it's a gaping fracture in reality, you don't call anyone; the Keepers are already there, and you've seen too much.
game.shortDescriptionEn: When it's mice, you call an exterminator. When it's criminals, you call the police. When it's a gaping fracture in reality, you don't call anyone; the Keepers are already there, and you've seen too much.
